channel.title: Help on 2 things !?
channel.description:
Hi ,
well i have 2 problems ...
My range hits way to high ...
1 lvl range hits 22s wit bronze arrow... ( idk how to lower the max hts )
And the other prob is.
The xp u get from mage att + the max hits
Thank you

item.title: Help on 2 things !?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

for EXP you find the ID number of thie thing you train on for that skill and CTRL+F search for

case ####:

is the object ID you train that skill from, and it can be 1-4 digits

look below it and you will see something like

addSkillXP((XP*playerLevel[S]), S);

the XP* in the parenthesis is the xp you get for clicking it
change it to what you like
heres something to help massers, off topic
add if(actionTimer == 0) { under the case line
and add actionTimer = 55; above the xp line, i made it 55 because i think its good to stop massers
post for more help

Read full topic
